description.value:
Your skill with your chosen weapon leaves opponents unable to defend themselves if you strike them when their defenses are already compromised.

Prerequisites
Weapon Focus, Dazzling Display, base attack bonus +6, proficiency with weapon.

Benefits
Any shaken, frightened, or panicked opponent hit by you this round is flat-footed to your attacks until the end of your next turn. This includes any additional attacks you make this round.

Combat Trick
When you hit an opponent that has been made flat-footed to your attacks by this feat, you can spend 5 stamina points to make that opponent flat-footed to the attacks of one ally who is within 30 feet of that creature until the start of your next turn.

contextNotes.text: Shattered Defenses: any @Compendium[pf1.conditions.07JPXUqIPshVnTCL]{Shaken}, @Compendium[pf1.conditions.QdwliEzfA3ZK9YtS]{Frightened}, or @Compendium[pf1.conditions.xhQma4Gl4wLO0jnZ]{Panicked} opponent hit by you this round is flat-footed to your attacks until the end of your next turn.
